attributes.comment:
I am writing urging that the proposed adoption fee's DO NOT increase. My wife
and I are currently in the process of adopting a baby girl from China. After months
of collecting the appropriate documents in addition to the numerous fee's
associated with every certification and authentication, this proposed fee increase
will drastically and negatively affect my family. As you are aware, as is, the
adoption process is a very expensive endeavor with all the local, state and federal
fee's required. The proposed fee increase would not only make adopting
unattainable for many families, but it would also crush the children who would
have otherwise had a successful, healthy future. Me and my family strongly
oppose the fee increase and we urge that you take our considerations to heart.

Thank you for your time...the Kim family.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Tommy Kim
